name: Find it easy with Vietnamese Cuisine >o<
description: Many of Vietnamese dishes have been recognized as the most delicious cuisines in the world, and the most popular of all is Phở. I believe that every foreigners coming to Vietnam have heard of this dish and tried it once; however, there are thousand of other traditional dishes you should taste while staying in Vietnam, for example: Lẩu riêu cua bò, Bánh trôi tàu, Bánh cuốn... Through this tour, you will not only taste those well-known dishes but also learn how to cook them. A chance to be a local cook, why not?
